Package com.soctec.soctec.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AchievementsAdapter
    Adapter for displaying several properties from Achievement in a single ListView slot
    AchievementsFragment
    Used to order and display any number of Achievements in two ListViews, one for locked Achievements, and one for completed Achievements.
    AchievementShowerActivity
    Shows a graphical representation of an Achievement
    HelpFragment
    Specialized DialogFragment for displaying "help"
    InfoFragment
    Displays information about the app in a DialogFragment
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is a tabbed activity, and sets up most of the other objects for the App
    MainFragment
    MainFragment shows the QR-code and handles the rating system
    ScanActivity
    Scans QR-codes and returns the result via the Intent Uses the following libraries which is under Apache License version 2.0: me.dm7.barcodescanner.zbar.Result; me.dm7.barcodescanner.zbar.ZBarScannerView; See license in License.txt in the project root.
    ScanFragment
    Filler for ViewPager
